nodes.text: A Mandalorian Militiaman was a type of soldier native to the planet Mandalore.

Mandalorian Militiamen fought against invading forces on Mandalore during the Galactic Civil War. They were stationed in various Mandalorian barracks around the planet. They wore modified sets of Mandalorian armor and often wielded blaster rifles similar in design to the EE-3 carbine rifle.
Mandalorian Militiamen may have been loyal to the Supreme Strategist until he was defeated by the Zann Consortium in 1 BBY.
